concept: MCQs on files, disk scheduling and protection.

challenges.title: Q1: Disk Scheduling Algorithm
challenges.description: Which of the following is a disk scheduling algorithm?
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) SSTF
b) FIFO
c) SJF
d) Round Robin
challenges.starterCode: // Mark your answer: a / b / c / d

challenges.title: Q2: File Protection Bits
challenges.description: In many OSes (like UNIX), file protection is specified using bits for:
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) Read, Write, Execute
b) Open, Close, Delete
c) Copy, Paste, Move
d) Create, Remove, Rename
challenges.starterCode: // Mark your answer: a / b / c / d
